description: A mandrel-built delivery hose specifically engineered for washing and cleaning purposes using hot or cold water. Widely used as washdown hose in dairies, creameries, milk, wine, and general food industries. Also used as delivery hose for hot water mixed with detergents. Used for sterilization in CIP food industry workshops.

properties.name: Standard
properties.value: FDA Title 21 Art. 177.2600 for aqueous foods. Phthalate-free. High resistance to many aggressive cleaning agents.

properties.name: Cover material
properties.value: synthetic blue rubber, wrapped or smooth fabric impression

properties.name: Marking
properties.value: continuous transfer tape: ROITER AC220 WASHDOWN - HOT WATER - WP 20BAR / 300PSI - MADE IN ITALY

subtitle: 3/4" (20bar)
title: WAM Roiter Hot Water Steam Hose
